content:
With the latest IG publisher, we can now have a fancy status box in each conformance resource, similar to what we have in the core standard publication :
image.png
I'll try to reuse what is out of the box. If we need something more fancy, we can add to the template
@Robin Bosman @Etienne Cantineau
I am also interested in having an improved search experience, but I will need some javascript help there. I will ping Nick and Lieven when I have something more concrete
